title: mnetbih
author: mnetbih
content: Hello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments. If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Avoid scam, scammers can send you PMs. There is nothing bad than to just invest in bitcoin. Trading can help but not advisable because it may take than give, I mean losses may be more than profits.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: You may do scalping or short term investment with different tokens but it won't be as easy as it may sound. You'll need to invest in knowledge first but that won't require you a monetary initial investment. That would only require you time and ofcourse devotion with what you will try to learn. There are many learning materials and best ones are videos demonstrating and sharing ideas. You may follow Marvin Favis, MoneyZg and the likes (not sponsored;just to name some) to know more of the fundamentals. In trading, it won't require you huge amount of money, and there will also be risks involved (which is normal). There are no easily earned money especially in this industry, you need to work hard for it. You may also join communities which will also help you grow and discover other ways to earn profit not only in trading.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Yatsan on November 12, 2022, 11:03:51 AMYou may do scalping or short term investment with different tokens but it won't be as easy as it may sound.Trading within short seconds to some minutes before the trade is closed is called scalping, that is not an investment but trading. To invest, you have to hold which can be up to some months to some years.I am not discouraging him to trade, but he should know that trading is very risky.

comments.author: DudeAtWork420
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments. If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!If you have any skills then there will always be some kind of work for you. You should just looking for work based on your skills. Without any skills you can not work in market place and without any work you will not be able to earn anything without investment. There is nothing free my friends and people pay for your time and value. The better your skills are the more valuable you will be.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments. If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!Yes, it's possible and there are too many ways that you can do to earn that amount on a daily basis. Aside from trading, you can earn it exactly as it is with freelance work. While you're studying to trade, learn also the freelancing marketplaces because that's where you're going to get most of the tasks and you'll have to get someone to pay for you in exchange for service or tasks that you'll do for them. Like the website: fiverr.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: the most recommended here is to invest in Bitcoin. but with small capital, I think producing for the short term is not good enough.trading is also not recommended if you don't have good skills. it will be more losses that reduce your capital than the profits you can get.hold your capital first. and learn short-term trading. with small capital, you can focus on trading altcoin assets. you have a lot to learn, don't be too hasty to put your money in the market. I hope you are lucky.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments. If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!Yes, Through loan and and use a margin trading to temporarily increase your capital in exchange for a small interest but it still involves a trading strategy but in this way you can earn your target profit by simply buying low selling high on day trading. There is no financial institution that can give that fixed income for a small capital if you are pertaining to a passive income such as staking. Only ponzi can give this promise but it's a scam. Trading with leverage or margin is the only way to accomplish it in crypto space.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments. If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!  - Do you mean you are a PWD(person with a disability) individual? There is a way here in cryptocurrency for you to earn 5-10$ per day here, and this method is to perform trading activity daily.And the good thing about the cryptocurrency industry is that it's not a barrier if someone cannot enter it. All that is needed is that you have at least enough knowledge of cryptocurrency and trading to know the correct steps to take to earn this amount.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments. If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!Mate, there’s no shortcut to earn quick money to be honest. Have you tried doing some freelancing works before trying your luck in Bitcoins or crypto? Moreover there will be always some risks if you invest in Bitcoin and aiming to take 5-10$ profit daily. Instead of this why not earn 5-10$ by using your skills? It’s not hard to learn photoshop or video editing(Free resources available on YT). Also if you are good in English, then try to write articles for people.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Trading is not an option for someone looking for money or that has no other option for money because they are going to be in a haste to make money and so they will be emotional and taking emotional decision and keep losing. For ops situation, it is a pity he is physically challenged but I think some countries have a way to support them through the association and learn a skill while he keep reading here, studying and understanding cryptocurrency and also growing his account.

If anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!Start learning more about trading, because that is possible in trading even if you have a small capital.There's a lot of ways now to earn profit online, you can be a bounty hunter, a trader or an active promoter of a certain project. Now what you can do is to continue searching for the best way that fits for you. You just need to avoid any scam projects and before dealing with anyone, do some research first.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs)You meant physically challenged? I think that's the universal word for those who are impared  bodily in one way or the other.Quoteto earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments.I guess you're asking for ways to earn passively. Staking or farming offers that. However, there are risks too associated with either staking or farming. Otherwise, there isn't any trading strategy that can guarantee you that range on daily basis. QuoteIf anyone knows, write in the inbox.Wrong move! You've just indirectly invited scammers in the form of sales reps to yourself. They're going to PM you to invest in whatever pseudo programmes they've just to scam you. You've to be extremely careful here.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: I think you should join a play-to-earn game telegram/or discord group and try to get a scholarship from someone. Once you get the scholarship you'll be able to play the game and on playing that game you will get some tokens which you can later convert into bitcoin or fiat. Keep in mind, that the individual who gives you the scholarship will take some percentages of your earnings.These are the top 5 games for which you should try for a scholarship. Axie Infinity  Thetan Arena  Aavegotchi  Splinterlands  Decentral Games

comments.author: |MINER|
comments.body: Earning 5/10 $ is not an impossible tasks at crypto . But if you are beginner then it will be hard for you . My suggestion will be for you that grow your knowledge about trading in this case you wanna earn daily so know about short-term/Day trading after that just trade with the candle line and avoid alt-coin for this choose btc for this invest to avoid loss and scam . But you can choose from the top coin -BNB, Ethereum, LTC . But keep in mind trading is very risky for investment and also keep mind that invest as much as you can afford to loose.

comments.author: Falconer
comments.body: Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMHello, is there a way for us who are immobile (disabled in legs) to earn 5-10$ a day, with some kind of bitcoin strategy without big investments.Earning $5-$10 per day without sufficient funds is difficult if you want to earn from trading. You may be able to make a profit from your trading strategy every day, but of course no strategy can really make a profit consistently every day because of price volatility. If you have good skills then futures trading looks great to you, but it's not the best advice one can think of.Quote from: mnetbih on November 12, 2022, 10:23:15 AMIf anyone knows, write in the inbox. Thank you for your cooperation, and I wish everyone a lot of success!No, that's not a good idea. Now you have to be careful with incoming PMs who offer you any kind of investment. There are a lot of people who want your money, so if you want to get a good idea then discuss it openly.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: There is no money machine in the crypto world of any kind that can guarantee you can earn money on a daily basis, trading staking farming or whatever. If someone has sent a message to your inbox with all the offers and certainty of daily profits, you can be sure he is a scammer and just ignore it.With limited investments you can spend it is better to learn specific skills and after that offer the skills you already have to earn money and accept payments with crypto.
